theory: The Boss Luffy Historical Specials were created as foreshadowing or test runs for the Wano Country Arc, given both feature Japanese historical settings.
author: Various fans (mentioned in discussions)
debunkExplanation: Despite superficial similarities in setting, the Boss Luffy specials were created in 2005-2009, years before Wano was adapted to anime. TV Tropes and multiple sources confirm there is no connection between the two - they just both happen to use Japanese historical settings. The Boss Luffy specials are based on side stories by Oda but are entirely separate from the main storyline.
evidenceFor: Both feature Edo period Japanese settings
Both reimagine One Piece characters in historical Japanese context
evidenceAgainst: Boss Luffy episodes aired 2005-2009, Wano arc began in manga 2018
Boss Luffy is explicitly non-canon alternate universe while Wano is canon
Different creative purposes - Boss Luffy is comedic filler, Wano is major story arc
Multiple sources confirm no connection between the two

sources.title: One Piece - Boss Luffy Historical Arc Recap
